<p>èƒŒæ™¯ï¼šæˆ‘ä»¬ä¹‹å‰ä»‹ç»è¿‡ midsence.js AIè‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–æµ‹è¯•è¾…åŠ©å·¥å…·ï¼Œmidsence.jsçš„æ€è·¯æˆ‘ä¸ªäººæ˜¯æ¯”è¾ƒè®¤å¯çš„ã€‚ç„¶è€Œï¼Œå› ä¸ºå®ƒæ˜¯åŸºäºTSè¯­è¨€å®ç°çš„ï¼Œæ›´å¤šçš„è½¯ä»¶æµ‹è¯•å·¥ç¨‹å¸ˆä½¿ç”¨Pythonè¯­è¨€ï¼æˆ‘æ¥ç”¨Pythonå®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªæ»¡è¶³æ›´å¤šæµ‹è¯•å·¥ç¨‹å¸ˆçš„éœ€æ±‚ã€‚</p>

<h2 id="auto-wingçš„å®šä½">auto-wingçš„å®šä½</h2>
<p>æ—¢ç„¶å€Ÿé‰´äº†midsence.jsçš„æ€è·¯ï¼Œä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä¸å«midsencepyï¼Ÿå› ä¸ºæˆ‘å¸Œæœ›åˆ›å»ºçš„AIè‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–è¾…åŠ©å·¥å…·å’Œmidsence.jsæœ‰ä¸€äº›å·®å¼‚ã€‚</p>
<ol>
<li>ä»–åº”è¯¥å¯ä»¥æ–¹ä¾¿çš„åº”ç”¨åˆ°ç°æœ‰çš„è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–é¡¹ç›®ä¸­ã€‚æ¯•ç«Ÿæˆ‘ä»¬å·²ç»ç¼–å†™äº†å¤§é‡çš„è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ–¹ä¾¿çš„æ¥å…¥AIæ˜¯æœ€å¥½çš„ã€‚</li>
<li>ä»–åº”è¯¥æ”¯æŒæ›´å¤šå›½å†…çš„LLMã€‚å›½å†…çš„LLMå¹¶ä¸å¼±äº†å¥½å§ï¼è¿™ä¸¤å¤©ä¸æ˜¯æ­£åœ¨è¢«<code>deepseek-v3</code>åˆ·å±ã€‚æ–¹ä¾¿åˆä¾¿å®œå¯¹å§ï¼ï¼Ÿ</li>
<li>ä»–åº”è¯¥æ”¯æŒ<code>playwright</code>å’Œ<code>selenium</code>ï¼›å¤§éƒ¨åˆ†å·¥å…·éƒ½æ˜¯åŸºäº<code>playwright</code>, ç„¶è€Œ<code>selenium</code>ä¼¼ä¹è¢«æŠ›å¼ƒäº†ï¼Œæˆ‘æ¥ç»™<code>selenium</code>ä¸Šä¸ªå‘¼å¸æœºã€‚</li>
</ol>
<p>å¾ˆé«˜å…´ï¼Œæˆ‘è¶ç€å¤§è¿‡å¹´åœ¨å®¶æ’¸å‡ºæ¥äº†ï¼Œæˆ‘è¿™ä¹ˆä¸º<code>æµ‹è¯•å·¥ç¨‹å¸ˆ</code>ç¾¤ä½“ç€æƒ³ï¼ŒGitHubåŠ ä¸ªâ­ä¸è¿‡åˆ†å§ï¼</p>
<p>ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆå« auto-wing? é‚£å½“ç„¶æ˜¯ç»™ä½ çš„è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–æµ‹è¯•æ’ä¸ŠAIçš„ç¿…è†€ ğŸª½ï¼Œç›´æ¥åŸåœ°èµ·é£ï¼Œå“ˆå“ˆï¼</p>
<h2 id="ç‰¹æ€§">ç‰¹æ€§</h2>
<p>â­ æ”¯æŒå¤šç§æ“ä½œï¼š<code>ai_action</code>ã€<code>ai_query</code>ã€<code>ai_assert</code>ã€‚</p>
<p>â­ æ”¯æŒå¤šæ¨¡å‹ï¼š<code>openai</code>ã€<code>qwen</code> å’Œ <code>deepseek</code>ã€‚</p>
<p>â­ æ”¯æŒ <code>playwright</code>ã€<code>selenium</code>ã€‚</p>
<p>â­ æ–¹ä¾¿çš„å’Œç°æœ‰è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–é¡¹ç›®ï¼ˆ<code>pytest</code>ã€<code>unittest</code>ï¼‰é›†æˆã€‚</p>
<h3 id="å®‰è£…">å®‰è£…</h3>
<pre><code class="language-shell">pip install autowing
</code></pre>
<h3 id="è®¾ç½®ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡">è®¾ç½®ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡</h3>
<p><strong>æ–¹æ³•ä¸€</strong></p>
<p>ç”³è¯·LLMéœ€è¦çš„keyï¼Œåœ¨é¡¹ç›®çš„æ ¹ç›®å½•ä¸‹åˆ›å»º<code>.env</code>æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚æ¨è<code>deepseek</code>ï¼Œä¸€æ˜¯ä¾¿å®œåˆå¼ºå¤§ï¼ˆæ²¡é”™ï¼Œæˆ‘å°±æ˜¯åœ¨è¹­è¹­DeepSeekï¼‰ã€‚</p>
<ul>
<li>DeepSeek: <a href="https://platform.deepseek.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://platform.deepseek.com/</a></li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-ini">#.env
AUTOWING_MODEL_PROVIDER=deepseek
DEEPSEEK_API_KEY=sk-abdefghijklmnopqrstwvwxyz0123456789
</code></pre>
<p><strong>æ–¹æ³•äºŒ</strong></p>
<blockquote>
<p>å¦‚æœä¸æƒ³ä½¿ç”¨python-dotenvé…ç½®ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥é…ç½®ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ã€‚</p>
</blockquote>
<pre><code class="language-shell">export AUTOWING_MODEL_PROVIDER=deepseek
export DEEPSEEK_API_KEY=sk-abdefghijklmnopqrstwvwxyz0123456789
</code></pre>
<h2 id="ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹">ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹</h2>
<p>æ³¨ï¼š <code>pytest</code> ã€<code>unittest</code> å’Œ <code>playwright</code>ã€<code>selenium</code>å¯ä»¥ä¸¤ä¸¤ä»»æ„ç»„åˆã€‚</p>
<ul>
<li>pytest + playwright ç¤ºä¾‹</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-python">"""
pytest example for Playwright with AI automation.
"""
import pytest
from playwright.sync_api import Page, sync_playwright
from autowing.playwright.fixture import create_fixture

from dotenv import load_dotenv


@pytest.fixture(scope="session")
def page():
    """
    playwright fixture
    """
    # loading .env file
    load_dotenv()
    with sync_playwright() as p:
        browser = p.chromium.launch(headless=False)
        context = browser.new_context()
        page = context.new_page()
        yield page
        context.close()
        browser.close()


@pytest.fixture
def ai(page):
    """
    ai fixture
    """
    ai_fixture = create_fixture()
    return ai_fixture(page)


def test_bing_search(page: Page, ai):
    """
    Test Bing search functionality using AI-driven automation.
    This test demonstrates:
    1. Navigating to Bing
    2. Performing a search
    3. Verifying search results
    """
    page.goto("https://cn.bing.com")

    ai.ai_action('æœç´¢è¾“å…¥æ¡†è¾“å…¥"playwright"å…³é”®å­—ï¼Œå¹¶å›è½¦')
    page.wait_for_timeout(3000)

    items = ai.ai_query('string[], æœç´¢ç»“æœåˆ—è¡¨ä¸­åŒ…å«"playwright"ç›¸å…³çš„æ ‡é¢˜')
    print("query", items)

    assert len(items) &gt; 1

    print("assert")
    assert ai.ai_assert('æ£€æŸ¥æœç´¢ç»“æœåˆ—è¡¨ç¬¬ä¸€æ¡æ ‡é¢˜æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«"playwright"å­—ç¬¦ä¸²')
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li>unittest + selenium ç¤ºä¾‹</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-python">"""
Unittest example for Selenium with AI automation.
"""
import unittest
import time
from selenium import webdriver
from autowing.selenium.fixture import create_fixture
from dotenv import load_dotenv


class TestBingSearch(unittest.TestCase):

    @classmethod
    def setUpClass(cls):
        # load .env file
        load_dotenv()
        # Initialize Edge WebDriver
        cls.driver = webdriver.Edge()
        # Create AI fixture
        ai_fixture = create_fixture()
        cls.ai = ai_fixture(cls.driver)

    @classmethod
    def tearDownClass(cls):
        cls.driver.quit()

    def test_01_bing_search(self):
        """
        Test Bing search functionality using AI-driven automation.

        This test demonstrates:
        1. Navigating to Bing
        2. Performing a search
        3. Verifying search results
        """
        self.driver.get("https://cn.bing.com")

        self.ai.ai_action('æœç´¢è¾“å…¥æ¡†è¾“å…¥"playwright"å…³é”®å­—ï¼Œå¹¶å›è½¦')
        time.sleep(3)

        items = self.ai.ai_query('string[], æœç´¢ç»“æœåˆ—è¡¨ä¸­åŒ…å«"playwright"ç›¸å…³çš„æ ‡é¢˜')
        print("query", items)

        self.assertGreater(len(items), 1)

        self.assertTrue(
            self.ai.ai_assert('æ£€æŸ¥æœç´¢ç»“æœåˆ—è¡¨ç¬¬ä¸€æ¡æ ‡é¢˜æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«"playwright"å­—ç¬¦ä¸²')
        )


if __name__ == '__main__':
    unittest.main()
</code></pre>
<h2 id="qa">Q/A</h2>
<ol>
<li>Appæ˜¯å¦æ”¯æŒï¼Ÿæœ‰è®¡åˆ’æ”¯æŒã€‚</li>
<li><code>auto-wing</code>åˆšå‘å¸ƒï¼Œè‚¯å®šè¿˜æœ‰ä¸å°‘å‘ï¼ŒåŠ äº†æˆ‘å¾®ä¿¡çš„å·²ç»æ¨åŠ¨é¡¹ç›®æ›´æ–°äº†ï¼Œè€Œä½ åªèƒ½å‘ä¸ªè¯„è®ºé»˜é»˜ç­‰å›å¤ã€‚</li>
<li><code>auto-wing</code>ç¨³å®šä¹‹åï¼Œ<code>seldom</code>å’Œ<code>lounger</code>é¡¹ç›®ä¹Ÿä¼šåŒæ­¥é›†æˆã€‚</li>
<li>æœ€åï¼Œç¥ç¦å¤§å®¶ï¼šæ–°å¹´å¿«ä¹~ï¼ã€‚</li>
</ol>

</div>
